title: Bananarang
summaries: The Bananarang is a Hardmode boomerang, which can be stacked up to 10 in one slot, and thrown rapidly, similarly to Light Discs. They return to the owner once they hit an enemy, come in contact with a block, or reach their maximum range. Bananarangs are dropped by Clowns with a chance of 20*1/5 (20%).
The Bananarang cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have modifiers.
